results.title: Comparison of effects of L/N-type and L-type calcium channel blockers on post-infarct cardiac remodelling in spontaneously hypertensive rats.
results.text_hl: We herein compared the effects of @CHEMICAL_cilnidipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:C065927 @@@cilnidipine@@@, an L/N-type CCB and @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@, an L-type CCB, on @<m>DISEASE_Ventricular_Remodeling</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020257 @@@post-infarct left ventricular (LV) remodelling@@@ in spontaneously @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertensive@@@ @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ (SHRs).

results.title: Amlodipine Ameliorates Ischemia-Induced Neovascularization in Diabetic Rats through Endothelial Progenitor Cell Mobilization
results.text_hl: Moreover, @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ prevents @<m>DISEASE_Ventricular_Remodeling</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020257 @@@LV remodeling@@@ and improves cardiac function after @DISEASE_Myocardial_Infarction @DISEASE_MESH:D009203 @@@AMI@@@, though the underlying mechanism is unclear.
